meanings.definition: To make a low, continuous sound
meanings.sent1: The stream murmurs as it flows over the smooth rocks.
meanings.sent2: The old house would murmur in the wind on stormy nights.
meanings.sent3: The engine began to murmur softly after the mechanic fixed it.
meanings.sent4: The distant thunder began to murmur its approach.
meanings.sent5: The fireplace would murmur softly, warming the room on cold evenings.
